QueryDef.Name: IndexCreatorForLabels
QueryDef.SQL: SELECT vCustomer.`vchCustomerName`, vCustomer.`vchCity`, vOrderHeader.`iOrderID`, vOrderHeader.`vchOrderNumber`, vOrderHeader.`vchJobName`, vOrderHeader.`vchPONumber`, vOrderHeader.`dtRequestDate`, vOrderHeader.`iStatus`, OrderLine.`iSerialID`, OrderLine.`iSlabid`, OrderLine.`iLineNumber`, OrderLine.`flSlabLength`, OrderLine.`flSlabWidth`, OrderLine.`iLaminateID`, OrderLine.`ToShip`, OrderLineCharge.`iQuantity`, OrderLineCharge.`vchChargecode`, OrderLineCharge.`vchChargeDesc`, Slab.`vchSlabDesc`, Laminate.`vchLaminateCode`, v_LineDetailDenormalized.`vchPONumber`, v_LineDetailDenormalized.`iRowID`, v_LineDetailDenormalized.`vchVendorItemCode`, v_LineDetailDenormalized.`flSize`, v_LineDetailDenormalized.`iPurchaseOrderLineID`, Charges.`tiSpecial` FROM ((((((vCustomer AS vCustomer INNER JOIN vOrderHeader AS vOrderHeader ON vCustomer.`iCustomerID` = vOrderHeader.`iCustomerID`) INNER JOIN vOrderLine AS OrderLine ON vOrderHeader.`iOrderID` = OrderLine.`iOrderID`) LEFT JOIN Slab AS Slab ON OrderLine.`iSlabid` = Slab.`iSlabID`) LEFT JOIN Laminate AS Laminate ON OrderLine.`iLaminateID` = Laminate.`iLaminateID`) INNER JOIN v_LineDetailDenormalized AS v_LineDetailDenormalized ON OrderLine.`iSerialID` = v_LineDetailDenormalized.`iSerialID`) LEFT JOIN OrderLineCharge AS OrderLineCharge ON OrderLine.`iSerialID` = OrderLineCharge.`iSerialID`) LEFT JOIN Charges AS Charges ON OrderLineCharge.`iChargeID` = Charges.`iChargeID` WHERE vOrderHeader.`iStatus` < 2 AND OrderLine.`iLaminateID` <> 0 AND OrderLine.`ToShip` > 0 AND vOrderHeader.`iOrderID` = 11772;

QueryDef.Name: qkogOrderReps
QueryDef.SQL: SELECT OrderRep.iRepID, OrderRep.vchUserName, OrderRep.vchFirstName, OrderRep.vchLastName, OrderRep.vchExtension FROM OrderRep WHERE (((OrderRep.tiActiveFlag)=1)) ORDER BY OrderRep.iOrderBy;

QueryDef.Name: qkogOrdersByType
qkPOGOELinesForPOLine
qkpogOrderPOStatusResults
QueryDef.SQL: SELECT OrderLine.iOrderID, Sum(PurchaseOrderDetail.iQuantity) AS iQuantity, Sum(PurchaseOrderDetail.iQuantityReceived) AS iQuantityReceived, First(OrderHeader.tiPOStatusID) AS tiPOStatusID FROM OrderHeader INNER JOIN (PurchaseOrderDetail INNER JOIN (OrderLine INNER JOIN PurchaseOrderDetailMapping ON (OrderLine.iSerialID = PurchaseOrderDetailMapping.iSerialID) AND (OrderLine.iSerialID = PurchaseOrderDetailMapping.iSerialID)) ON PurchaseOrderDetail.iPurchaseOrderLineID = PurchaseOrderDetailMapping.iPurchaseOrderLineID) ON OrderHeader.iOrderID = OrderLine.iOrderID WHERE (OrderHeader.iStatus<2 AND PurchaseOrderDetail.tiIsSlab=True AND PurchaseOrderDetail.iPurchaseOrderID>1) GROUP BY OrderLine.iOrderID;

QueryDef.Name: qkpogOrdersOnPurchaseOrder
qkpogOrdersWithoutPos
QueryDef.SQL: SELECT OrderHeader.iOrderID, OrderHeader.vchOrderNumber AS [Order Number], Customer.vchCustomerName AS Customer, OrderHeader.vchJobName AS Jobname, OrderHeader.vchPONumber AS PO, OrderHeader.dtRequestDate AS RequestDate, DocumentStatus.vchStatusDescription, [vchFirstName] & " " & [vchLastName] AS [OE Rep], OrderHeader.tiRush, OrderHeader.tiPOStatusID, OrderHeader.dtRequestDate AS ReqDate FROM OrderRep INNER JOIN ((DocumentStatus INNER JOIN (qkpogOrderIdsWithoutPos INNER JOIN OrderHeader ON qkpogOrderIdsWithoutPos.iOrderID = OrderHeader.iOrderID) ON DocumentStatus.iDocumentStatus = OrderHeader.iStatus) INNER JOIN Customer ON OrderHeader.iCustomerID = Customer.iCustomerID) ON OrderRep.iRepID = OrderHeader.iUserID;

QueryDef.Name: qkpoGPendingOrderReport
QueryDef.SQL: SELECT qkPOGPendingOrderTotals.iOrderID, qkPOGPendingOrderTotals.TotalFootage, OrderHeader.vchOrderNumber, Customer.vchCustomerName, OrderHeader.vchJobName, OrderHeader.vchPONumber, OrderHeader.dtRequestDate, [OrderRep].[vchFirstName] & " " & [OrderRep].[vchLastName] AS Rep, qkPOGPendingOrderTotals.vchGroupByCode FROM OrderRep INNER JOIN ((qkPOGPendingOrderTotals INNER JOIN OrderHeader ON qkPOGPendingOrderTotals.iOrderID = OrderHeader.iOrderID) INNER JOIN Customer ON OrderHeader.iCustomerID = Customer.iCustomerID) ON OrderRep.iRepID = OrderHeader.iUserID;

QueryDef.Name: qkPOGPendingOrderTotals
qkpogPOItemsOnOrder
qkpogPurchaseOrderByStatus
qkpovOrderItemsOnOrder
qkpovPendingPurchaseOrderItems
qkpovPOItems
QueryDef.SQL: SELECT Laminate.vchBrandCode, Laminate.vchLaminateCode, Slab.vchVendorCode, Slab.vchVendorDesc, Slab.iSlabID, OrderLine.iSerialID, OrderLine.txtLineDesc, OrderLine.iLineNumber, OrderLine.flOrderableLength, OrderLine.iOrdered, Slab.iVendorSlabTypeID, VendorSlabType.iVendorID, LaminateUpcharge.tiSpecialOrder, Laminate.iPricecode, OrderLine.iOrderID, OrderLine.tiOnPo FROM LaminateUpcharge INNER JOIN ((Laminate INNER JOIN (Slab INNER JOIN OrderLine ON Slab.iSlabID = OrderLine.iSlabid) ON Laminate.iLaminateID = OrderLine.iLaminateID) INNER JOIN VendorSlabType ON Slab.iVendorSlabTypeID = VendorSlabType.iVendorSlabTypeID) ON LaminateUpcharge.iPriceCode = Laminate.iPricecode;

QueryDef.Name: qkpovPurchaseOrderSlabTypes
vOrderLine
QueryDef.SQL: SELECT OrderLine.*, OrderLine.[iOrdered]-[iShipped] AS ToShip FROM OrderLine;

QueryDef.Name: vw_OrderLineToPODetail
QueryDef.SQL: SELECT PurchaseOrderDetailMapping.iSerialID, PurchaseOrderDetailMapping.iItemNumber, PurchaseOrderDetail.vchGroupByCode, PurchaseOrderDetail.vchVendorItemCode, PurchaseOrderDetail.vchItemDescription, PurchaseOrderDetail.flSize, PurchaseOrderDetail.iQuantity, PurchaseOrderDetail.tiIsSlab, PurchaseOrderDetail.dcLengthUsed, PurchaseOrderDetail.iQuantityReceived, PurchaseOrder.vchPONumber, PurchaseOrder.dtDateOrdered, PurchaseOrder.dtReceived FROM PurchaseOrder INNER JOIN (PurchaseOrderDetail INNER JOIN PurchaseOrderDetailMapping ON PurchaseOrderDetail.iPurchaseOrderLineID = PurchaseOrderDetailMapping.iPurchaseOrderLineID) ON PurchaseOrder.iPurchaseOrderID = PurchaseOrderDetail.iPurchaseOrderID;
